article.headline: Prairie View 71, Grambling St. 54
article.story: DALLAS -- Brandon Webb scored 13 points to lead Prairie View to a 71-54 win over Grambling State on Saturday night. The Panthers (5-12, 2-2 Southwestern Athletic) led 35-27 at halftime and finished shooting 25 for 49 from the field, including nine 3-pointers. Trant Simpson and Duwan Kornegay each scored 12 points and Cortney Bell added 10 for Prairie View. Rupert Rose led the Tigers (3-14, 1-4) with a game-high 15 points while Justin Patton added 10. Grambling State was outrebounded 46-36 and shot just 18 for 62 from the field, including five 3-pointers.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
